Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Submitting the name of Hope Knight for appointment as a member of the New York City Planning Commission pursuant to §§ 31 and 192(a) of the New York City Charter.

Items.Title: Resolution authorizing the Speaker to file or join an amicus brief on behalf of the Council in the litigation captioned Avella, et al. v. City of New York, et al., currently on appeal at the New York Court of Appeals, No. APL-2015-00298, to support the prior approval of the Willets Point development plan by the City Council.
